Uses of Class
org.apache.struts2.tiles.annotation.TilesDefinition

Packages that use TilesDefinition
org.apache.struts2.tiles   
 

Uses of TilesDefinition in org.apache.struts2.tiles
 

Methods in org.apache.struts2.tiles that return TilesDefinition
 TilesDefinition StrutsTilesAnnotationProcessor.findAnnotation(Object action, String tileName)
          Search strategy is as follows: Check if action has Annotation TilesDefinition If not, check if action has Annotation TilesDefinitions If given tileName is not null and present in TilesDefinitions, return it Return first element of TilesDefinitions Return null
 

Methods in org.apache.struts2.tiles with parameters of type TilesDefinition
protected  org.apache.tiles.Attribute StrutsTilesAnnotationProcessor.buildTemplateAttribute(TilesDefinition tilesDef)
           
 org.apache.tiles.Definition StrutsTilesAnnotationProcessor.buildTilesDefinition(String tileName, TilesDefinition tilesDefinition)
          Builds a Definition based on given TilesDefinition with given name.
